title: Question on the topic of gifting
body: If you add someone as a friend, do you have to wait to be able to gift them? Because some guy denied me a penta and felt sorry (Primetime Draven ftw) so does anybody know how long I will have to wait?

replies.body: It takes one day before you can [gift ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ)someone you added as a friend.

And here's Lew with the assist! 

Just as Lew said, you'll need to be friends with someone for 24 hours before you'll be able to send gifts to each other. Keep in mind that you can also send gifts to people in the after game lobby on the legacy client too!
